channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- pdns
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- pdns

item.title: CVE-2019-10203|2024-08-04T22:17:18.889Z -- red%20hat -- pdns
item.description: PowerDNS Authoritative daemon , pdns versions 4.0.x before 4.0.9, 4.1.x before 4.1.11, exiting when encountering a serial between 2^31 and 2^32-1 while trying to notify a slave leads to DoS.
